long_description: Spatial parameters are estimated by a Error Tracking Kalman Filter (ETKF) with Rauch-Tung-Striebel (RTS) smoothing.  For ZUPT detection this method uses a more advanced ZUPT detector that forces the existence of one ZUPT event per stride. This can help with fast walks, where a simple threshold based ZUPT detector tuned for normal speeds might not be able to detect ZUPT events.
